title: Anthony Anderson's wife files for divorce after 20 years
content:
By Sadie Gennis,

Anthony Anderson 

The couple, who were high school sweethearts, tied the knot in 1995. Alvina is seeking joint legal custody and primary physical custody of their youngest child Nathan, 15. They also share a 19-year-old daughter, Kira.

The most shocking celebrity breakups 

In the court documents, Alvina lists the date of separation as April 1, 2014, a few months prior to the premiere of Anthony's hit comedy Black-ish.
